about_the_game:
Solace Inc. is back and ready to kick some ass! Join the crew, grab some weapons, and travel across spacetime to fight some baddies... or fight each other?

Solace Inc. 2 is an expansion of the first game's universe in a brand new dimension, with new worlds and foes as well as familiar places and faces. Play as a wide variety of unique characters with an expansive arsenal of weapons, and fight against a variety of foes ranging from alien insects, to rogue robots, to screaming demons, and more!

Demo Features:

  • 10+ playable characters with unique special abilities and attributes

  • Dozens of unlockable and craftable weapons

  • Wide variety of worlds to explore and fight in

  • Charming dialogue from a vast cast of characters

  • Challenging foes and bosses who don't like you very much

This demo only includes a portion of what will be in the final product, so some features like Multiplayer will be unavailable or incomplete. The full game will include more maps, weapons, playable characters, enemies, and much more!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains mature and suggestive content, which includes:

- Occasional swearing
- Exaggerated body proportions (i.e. large breasts)
- Jiggle physics (can be disabled)
- Revealing outfits
- Mild violence and cartoon-ish blood

name: Solace Inc. 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: doesn't really matter
  • Additional Notes: if you have a computer that isn't 10 years old you'll be fine
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Rizzdows 10
  • Processor: Skibidi(R) Core(TM)
  • Graphics: Ohio RTX
  • Storage: 257 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: you should be spending less time reading this and more time wishlisting the game

short_description: A demo for a co-op shooter about a time-travelling company where you recruit your employees against even more hordes of enemies.
